message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000.  It's a great deal for you, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know your thoughts!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have a limited budget.

Bob, I understand you have a limited budget, and I want to make this work.  I'm willing to come down to $13,000. This is a significant price reduction, but I value your interest in the product. Let me know if you're willing to meet me in the middle.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,500. I'm really interested in the product, but I'm trying to stay within my budget.
